name: Making the Way
description: La-a (Ladasha) dreams of an adventure, and since living in a small village in a valley her entire life, all she wants is to get out and go somewhere. Day by day, she would help her grandmother around the house and village, only to end up going to bed with a sense of dissatisfaction in her life. However, when La-a’s grandmother winds up with a cough that won't let up, she remembers hearing about a magic flower that grows on the top of the peak of the tallest mountain that looms over their village. In this adventure-platformer-style game, the player will use a grappling hook to swing from boulder to boulder, dodging falling rocks and hazardous water in caves and on cliff sides. Make the way to the mountain peak and save La-a’s grandmother from her illness in this fun and challenging game!
